00007 #include <cstring>
00008 #include <cstdio>
00009 #include "common.h"
00010 #include "string_buffer.h"
00011 
00012 #define DEFAULT_ALLOC_SIZE BUF_SIZE
00013 
00014 namespace MeCab {
00015 
00016 bool StringBuffer::reserve(size_t length) {
00017   if (!is_delete_) {
00018     error_ = (size_ + length >= alloc_size_);
00019     return (!error_);
00020   }
00021 
00022   if (size_ + length >= alloc_size_) {
00023     if (alloc_size_ == 0) {
00024       alloc_size_ = DEFAULT_ALLOC_SIZE;
00025       ptr_ = new char[alloc_size_];
00026     }
00027     size_t len = size_ + length;
00028     do {
00029       alloc_size_ *= 2;
00030     } while (len >= alloc_size_);
00031     char *new_ptr = new char[alloc_size_];
00032     std::memcpy(new_ptr, ptr_, size_);
00033     delete [] ptr_;
00034     ptr_ = new_ptr;
00035   }
00036 
00037   return true;
00038 }
00039 
00040 StringBuffer::~StringBuffer() {
00041   if (is_delete_) {
00042     delete [] ptr_;
00043     ptr_ = 0;
00044   }
00045 }
00046 
00047 StringBuffer& StringBuffer::write(char str) {
00048   if (reserve(1)) {
00049     ptr_[size_] = str;
00050     ++size_;
00051   }
00052   return *this;
00053 }
00054 
00055 StringBuffer& StringBuffer::write(const char* str) {
00056   return this->write(str, std::strlen(str));
00057 }
00058 
00059 StringBuffer& StringBuffer::write(const char* str, size_t length) {
00060   if (reserve(length)) {
00061     std::memcpy(ptr_ + size_ , str, length);
00062     size_ += length;
00063   }
00064   return *this;
00065 }
00066 }
